## DataBarBorderType enumeration

Specifies the border type of a data bar.

```csharp
public enum DataBarBorderType
```

### Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| None | `0` | The data bar has no border. |
| Solid | `1` | The data bar has a solid border. |
